name: agent-nudge-server
description: Local status server for Agent Nudge Chrome extension

scripts.start:bg: nohup node server.js > agent-nudge.log 2>&1 & echo $! > agent-nudge.pid && echo 'Server started in background (PID: '$(cat agent-nudge.pid)')'
scripts.stop: if [ -f agent-nudge.pid ]; then kill $(cat agent-nudge.pid) 2>/dev/null; rm -f agent-nudge.pid; echo 'Server stopped'; elif PID=$(lsof -ti :${AGENT_NUDGE_PORT:-9999} 2>/dev/null); then kill $PID && echo 'Server stopped (PID: '$PID')'; else echo 'No server running'; fi
scripts.status: if [ -f agent-nudge.pid ] && kill -0 $(cat agent-nudge.pid) 2>/dev/null; then echo 'Server running (PID: '$(cat agent-nudge.pid)')'; elif PID=$(lsof -ti :${AGENT_NUDGE_PORT:-9999} 2>/dev/null); then echo 'Server running (PID: '$PID')'; else echo 'Server not running'; fi
